description: A Flutter screen widget that allows users to create or edit a note, including form fields for title and content, and logic to save or update notes via a provider.

classes.name: EditNoteArgs
classes.description: A class representing navigation arguments for the EditNoteScreen, holding the note to be edited or null for new notes.

classes.name: EditNoteScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that provides a user interface for creating or editing notes.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes text controllers and sets up state when the widget is first inserted into the widget tree.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Retrieves navigation arguments and initializes form fields based on the note to edit.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates form, saves a new note or updates an existing one via provider, and handles UI feedback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the screen, including form fields, app bar, and save button.
